3.13.0.0.message: Fixed an issue where SDP (Sensitive Data Protection) filter violations were not detected. The plugin now correctly handles both RAI-style results (matchState + confidenceLevel) and SDP-style results (matchState + findings array with infoType and likelihood).
Added block reason and processing latency metrics to GCP Model Armor plugin analytics.

3.12.0.0.message: Added a new `GCP Model Armor` plugin that can protect requests and responses to/from AI LLM.
